mapper.select: Select protectboard_id , protectboardno , content , protectimagepath , breeds , ani_category , writedate , status , deadline FROM protectboard ORDER BY deadline ASC , protectboardno ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO protectboard (protectboard_id , protectboardno , content , protectimagepath , breeds , ani_category , writedate , status , deadline) VALUES (#{protectboard_id} , #{protectboardno} , #{content} , #{protectimagepath} , #{breeds} , #{ani_category} ,#{writedate} , #{status} ,#{deadline} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM protectboard WHERE protectboard_id = #{protectboard_id} and protectboardno = #{protectboardno}
